TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1166
TEI.2.document_title: Alexander Calvit to Stephen F Austin, 08-16-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Alexander Calvit to Austin, August 16, 1825. Concerning land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1166

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Alexander Calvit to Austin, August 16, 1825. Concerning land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Neich Texas*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-16-1825">August, 16. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colo Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr. Sir: Permit me to ask the favor of you if Consistant with the nature of your Business to hoald in reserve for my *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*and my Self that *location_mentioned*League of Land made Choice of on the St. Bernardo*/location_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Mr. James Brown from *location_mentioned*Alexandria*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*Mr. Cumins*/person_mentioned* hoalds *person_mentioned*Prara Lands*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Immediately opposite*/location_mentioned* As I have only obtained the one half of what I am Intitled to you will do me a particular favor if it is not already marked out for Some other person to place my name on the *location_mentioned*map */location_mentioned*so as to cover it the payment of which we calculate on makeing from the soil in Cotton the Insuing season*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Alexn Calvitt */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Colo S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*N. B. please to inform me if I am successfull or not*/p*
*/div1*
